thread.title: Hina Khan reveals that she had to throw all her hair care products because of her stage three breast cancer diagnosis; says, 'I hate wasting my hard-earned money but…' - Times of India
thread.title_full: Hina Khan reveals that she had to throw all her hair care products because of her stage three breast cancer diagnosis; says, 'I hate wasting my hard-earned money but…' - Times of India

author: etimes.in
title: Hina Khan reveals that she had to throw all her hair care products because of her stage three breast cancer diagnosis; says, 'I hate wasting my hard-earned money but…' - Times of India
text:
Hina Khan , best known for her role in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, is battling with stage three of breast cancer. The actress is courageously fighting the cancer battle and has kept fans updated with her journey through. She recently entered a new phase of her life as she got married to longtime boyfriend Rocky Jaiswal. Hina has now made a revelation claiming how she had to throw tons of her hair-care products due to her cancer diagnosis. Hina shared a video on her Instagram stories while opening up about how she had to throw tons of her hair-care products, which got expired as she wasn’t able to use them due to her cancer diagnosis. She further mentioned how she hates wasting her hard-earned money, and she has learnt a lesson now. Hina Khan Shares Cozy Moment With Rocky Jaiswal In the video, she showed the products and said, “All these products are now a waste. I used to keep 3–4 backups of all my products so that I can use it whenever I need. However, because of my cancer diagnosis, I lost all my hair and couldn’t use these products. Now when my hair is growing back, everything has expired. I feel so bad but have learnt an important lesson.” Poll Do you think sharing personal struggles helps celebrities connect with their fans? Yes, definitely No, it doesn't matter She later shared a long note talking about the same. The post read, “Kaash thoda bhi khayal aaya hota to apni family mai hi distribute kar deti but me and my fam, hum pareshaani mai iss qadar ghire hue the ki kuch aur yaad hi nahi tha… It’s my hard-earned money and I hate to waste anything… Koi nai, lesson learnt. You lose some, you win some… Allah achi sehat de. That’s more important thn anything else.” On the work front, Hina is best known for her role in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. Moreover, Hina and Rocky are geared up for their first on-screen appearance together on Pati Patni Aur Panga. Fans are eagerly waiting to witness a glimpse of their bond.
